paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Hive ACID Transactions
**Objective:** Demonstrate the architecture of ORC and it meets ACID standards
**File locations:** hostname:/tmp/marvel HDFS://data/marvel/marvel-wikia-data.csv
**Successful outcome
:** Understand the architecture of ORC
**Before you begin:**
**Related lessons:** Hive ORC Architecture

---

msg.data:
About

Lab: Hive ACID Transactions
Objective: Demonstrate the architecture of ORC and it meets ACID standards
File locations: hostname:/tmp/marvel HDFS://data/marvel/marvel-wikia-data.csv
Successful outcome: Understand the architecture of ORC
Before you begin:
Related lessons: Hive ORC Architecture

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the files from source
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r /tmp/dc
mkdir /tmp/dc
wget https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/raw/master/comic-characters/dc-wikia-data.csv -O /tmp/dc/dc-wikia-data.csv

paragraphs.title: List the file
paragraphs.text:
%sh
ls /tmp/dc

paragraphs.title: Move the data into HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -put /tmp/dc/dc-wikia-data.csv /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chmod 777 /data/dc

paragraphs.title: Grant Hive access to /data/dc
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chown -R hive /data/dc

paragraphs.title: List the contents of HDFS /data/dc
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -ls /data/dc

%md
# Lab
---

%md
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid_insert **insert transcational** table to store our data.

~~~console
CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid_insert ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
                        ) 
STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

msg.data:

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 1 - Drop table dc_comics_acid_insert  if it already exists
2 - Create table dc_comics_acid_insert
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid_insert ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string) 
STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');

paragraphs.text:
%md
Next we are going to insert the following three records into our new table **using three insert statements**
~~~console
1422,Batman (Bruce Wayne),\/wiki\/Batman_(Bruce_Wayne),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,3093,"1939, May",1939
23387,Superman (Clark Kent),\/wiki\/Superman_(Clark_Kent),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,2496,"1986, October",1986
1458,Green Lantern (Hal Jordan),\/wiki\/Green_Lantern_(Hal_Jordan),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Brown Eyes,Brown Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,1565,"1959, October",1959
~~~

paragraphs.text:
%md
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid **transactional** table to store our data.

~~~console
 CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

msg.data:
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid transactional table to store our data.

 CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the table dc_comics_acid and create the table stored as ORC format
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dc_comics_acid;

-- Notice that we are allowing all types of transactions on this table, whereas on the previous table we only allowed inserts

CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
                        ) 
STORED AS ORC 
TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');

paragraphs.title: 9 - Now call multiple commands consecutively

paragraphs.text:
%md
Depending on system factors like configuration settings, available CPUs, and available memory the commands may be processed in various ways. They may run fully concurrently, they may run at the same time only for some period, or they may run consecutively.

However the commands are processed the ACID properties ensure the integrity of the table.

msg.data:

However the commands are processed the ACID properties ensure the integrity of the table.

paragraphs.title: 14 - Show default tables
15 - Explore the HDFS file system
paragraphs.text:
%md
####Action
Go to Ambari > File View
Search through /warehouse/tablespace/managed/hive. Review to see the layout of the directories and the data files.
Notice the size of the delta files. If you do this repeatedly you will be able to observe compaction.

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Reset

paragraphs.title: Drop tables
Delete raw data
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/dc # is this needed? has data been altered?

sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -put /tmp/dc/dc-wikia-data.csv /data/dc
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chmod 777 /data/dc

sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -chown -R hive /data/dc

%md
# Exercise

paragraphs.title: 15 - Explore the HDFS file system
paragraphs.text:
%md
####Action
Go to Ambari > File View
Search through /warehouse/tablespace/managed/hive. Review to see the layout of the directories and the data files.
Notice the size of the delta files. If you do this repeatedly you will be able to observe compaction.
